edu.harvard.cs262.GameClient.SimpleClient

Class SimpleClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.cs262.GameClient.SimpleClient.SimpleClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameClient, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UpdateableClient

    public class SimpleClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameClient
    Basic client that, given correctly implemented dependencies (display and inputParser) runs a game by allowing an executable class to instantiate this one and send inputs to the master by calling the sendInput() method.
    Version:
    1.0, April 2014
    Author:
    Twitch Plays Battleship Group

      • sendInput

        public void sendInput(java.lang.String input)
        Take an input string, pass it to the input parser, and send the resulting command to the master server.
        Parameters:
        input - A string properly formatted for this game's input parser to return a relevant command.

        Ping input server to make sure that it is still up.
        Parameters:
        s - A GameServer to ping.
        Returns:
        boolean True if server is up, false otherwise.

      • isMaster

        Ping input server to test that it is the master.
        Parameters:
        s - A GameServer to ping.
        Returns:
        boolean True if server is up, false otherwise.

      • addPeer

        public boolean addPeer(java.util.UUID id,
              GameServer server)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a new slave server to the list of slaves.
        Specified by:
        addPeer in interface GameClient
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID of the new server to be added
        server - The GameServer object to be added to the slaves
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if the new slave is correctly added
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - when a communication error occurs. Required by extending RMI

      • removePeer

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • setPeers

        public boolean setPeers(java.util.Hashtable<java.util.UUID,GameServer> servers)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the list of slaves
        Specified by:
        setPeers in interface GameClient
        Parameters:
        servers - A Hashtable that matches UUID to GameServer objects that represents the slave servers
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if the slave list is correctly set to the passed-in list of slaves
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - when a communication error occurs. Required by extending RMI

      • getUpdatedPeers

        public boolean getUpdatedPeers()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the updated list of slaves from the master and sets the slave list to the list returned from the master
        Specified by:
        getUpdatedPeers in interface GameClient
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if the slave list is correctly set and false if there is an RMI error
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - when a communication error occurs. Required by extending RMI
